changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "document" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "kind" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "title" TEXT NOT NULL, "storage_key" TEXT NOT NULL, "mimetype" TEXT NOT NULL, "file_size" BIGINT NOT NULL, "content_sha256" TEXT NOT NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, "replaced_document_id" UUID NULL, "organization_id" UUID NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("replaced_document_id") REFERENCES "document" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL ); CREATE INDEX "idx_document_organization_id" ON "document" ("organization_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "organization_id" IS NOT NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_document_replaced_document_id" ON "document" ("replaced_document_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "replaced_document_id" IS NOT NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_document_content_sha256_active" ON "document" ("content_sha256") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL;
